00004 /*!  \file   octeon_stats.h
00005      \brief  Host Driver: Statistics provided by the driver for different queues and
00006              buffer pool.
00007 */

00010 #ifndef  __OCTEON_STATS_H__ 
00011 #define  __OCTEON_STATS_H__ 
00012 
00013 #include "octeon_config.h"
00014 
00015 #define   OCTEON_BUFFER_POOL_STATS_ON      0x01
00016 #define   OCTEON_CNTQ_STATS_ON             0x02
00017 
00018 
00019 /** Statistics table for octeon device. */
00020 typedef struct {
00021 
00022     /** Number of interrupts received. */
00023         uint64_t  interrupts; 
00024 
00025     /** Poll thread ran these many times. */
00026         uint64_t  poll_count; 
00027 
00028     /** Request completion tasklet ran these many times */
00029     uint64_t  comp_tasklet_count; 
00030 
00031     /** DROQ tasklet ran these many times */
00032     uint64_t  droq_tasklet_count;
00033 
00034     /** CNTQ tasklet ran these many times */
00035     uint64_t  cntq_tasklet_count;
00036 } oct_dev_stats_t;
00037 
00038 
00039 
00040 /** Buffer pool statistics. Each of the buffer pool has four stats fields.*/
00041 typedef struct {
00042 
00043     /** Buffer created in this pool at init time. */
00044     uint32_t   max_count;
00045 
00046     /** Buffers allocated from this pool by driver. */
00047     uint32_t   alloc_count;
00048 
00049     /** Fragmented buffer count. */
00050     uint32_t   frag_count;
00051 
00052     /** Buffers moved to other pools. */
00053     uint32_t   other_pool_count;
00054 
00055 } oct_bufpool_stats_t;
00056 
00057 #define OCT_BUFPOOL_STATS_SIZE  (sizeof(oct_bufpool_stats_t))
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061 /** Input Queue statistics. Each input queue has four stats fields. */
00062 typedef struct {
00063 
00064   uint64_t   instr_posted; /**< Instructions posted to this queue. */
00065   uint64_t   instr_processed; /**< Instructions processed in this queue. */
00066   uint64_t   instr_dropped;   /**< Instructions that could not be processed. */
00067   uint64_t   bytes_sent;      /**< Bytes sent through this queue. */
00068   uint64_t   sgentry_sent;    /**< Gather entries sent through this queue. */
00069 
00070 } oct_iq_stats_t;
00071 
00072 #define OCT_IQ_STATS_SIZE   (sizeof(oct_iq_stats_t))
00073 
00074 
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 /** Output Queue statistics. Each output queue has four stats fields. */
00079 typedef struct {
00080 
00081   uint64_t   pkts_received; /**< Number of packets received in this queue. */
00082   uint64_t   bytes_received;/**< Bytes received by this queue. */
00083   uint64_t   dropped_nodispatch; /**< Packets dropped due to no dispatch function. */
00084   uint64_t   dropped_nomem; /**< Packets dropped due to no memory available. */
00085   uint64_t   dropped_toomany; /**< Packets dropped due to large number of pkts to process. */
00086 } oct_droq_stats_t;
00087 
00088 #define OCT_DROQ_STATS_SIZE   (sizeof(oct_droq_stats_t))
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 /** Statistics for Octeon DMA Counter queues (CNTQ) */
00093 typedef struct  {
00094 
00095     uint64_t   pkts_received;
00096     uint64_t   bytes_received;
00097     uint64_t   dropped_nodispatch;
00098     uint64_t   dropped_nomem;
00099     uint64_t   credits_posted;
00100     uint64_t   credits_failed;
00101 
00102 } oct_cntq_stats_t;
00103 
00104 #define OCT_CNTQ_STATS_SIZE    (sizeof(oct_cntq_stats_t))
00105 
00106 
00107 
00108 
00109 /** Each DDOQ in the system stores its stats in this format. */
00110 typedef struct {
00111 
00112     uint64_t  packets_recvd;
00113     uint64_t  multibuf_pkts_recvd;
00114     uint64_t  packets_dropped;
00115 
00116     uint64_t  bytes_received;
00117     uint64_t  buffers_recvd;
00118     uint64_t  credit_instr_cnt;
00119     uint64_t  credit_desc_cnt;
00120     uint64_t  credit_instr_failed;
00121     
00122     uint64_t  desc_pending_refill;
00123     uint64_t  desc_pending_credit;
00124     uint64_t  pkts_pending;
00125     uint64_t  state;
00126 
00127 } oct_ddoq_stats_t;
00128 
00129 #define OCT_DDOQ_STATS_SIZE    (sizeof(oct_ddoq_stats_t))
00130 
00131 
00132 
00133 
00134 
00135 /** System-wide statistics for DDOQ implementation. */
00136 typedef struct {
00137 
00138     uint64_t   ddoqs_created;
00139     uint64_t   create_failed;
00140     uint64_t   active_ddoqs;
00141     uint64_t   ddoqs_pending_eot;
00142     uint64_t   del_b4_crt;
00143 
00144 } oct_ddoq_list_stats_t;
00145 
00146 #define OCT_DDOQ_LIST_STATS_SIZE    (sizeof(oct_ddoq_list_stats_t))
00147 
00148 
00149 
00150 
00151 /** Octeon device statistics */
00152 typedef struct {
00153 
00154     uint64_t              magic; /**< Magic word to verify correctness of structure. */
00155     uint8_t               oct_id;
00156     uint8_t               debug_level; /**< The current debug level. */
00157     uint16_t              components; /**< Indicates what components are present. */
00158     uint16_t              reserved;
00159     char                  dev_state[32]; /** < Current state of the octeon device. */
00160     oct_bufpool_stats_t   bufpool[BUF_POOLS]; /**< The buffer pool statistics. */
00161     oct_iq_stats_t        iq[32]; /**< The input queue statistics. */
00162     oct_droq_stats_t      droq[32]; /**< The output queue statistics. */
00163     oct_cntq_stats_t      cntq[MAX_OCTEON_DMA_QUEUES]; /**< DMQ Counter queue statistics. */
00164     oct_ddoq_list_stats_t ddoq_list; /**< DDOQ system-wide statistics */
00165 
00166 } oct_stats_t;
00167 
00168 #define  OCT_STATS_SIZE   (sizeof(oct_stats_t))
